sentences.sContent: Publishers and writers from 13 countries attended the seminar .
sentences.sCn: 来自13个国家的出版商和作家参加了此次研讨会。

remMethod.val: semi(半) + nar → 每半年举行一次研讨会 → 研讨会； 参考： seminary(n. 神学院)

trans.tranOther: a class at a university or college for a small group of students and a teacher to study or discuss a particular subject
